title: 석·박사과정(통합 포함) 재학년한 연장 신청 안내 (Application for Extension of Academic Period for Graduate Students(including Intergrated MS­PhD)
content: 2014. 2. 28일부 재학년한이 만료되는 석박사과정(통합포함) 학생의 재학년한 연장 승인여부 심의(학사연구심의위원회)를 위한 신청절차를 아래와 같이 안내합니다. =  아 래  = 가 . 대상 : 2014. 2. 28일부로 재학년한이 만료되는 석박사과정(통합포함) 학생 중 재학년한 연장 신청이 가능한 자 (2014. 2월 졸업예정자 제외) * 대상자 명단은 별도 통보하지 않음 . 나 . 제출서류 : 재학년한 연장 신청서 1부. 다 . 제출기한 : 2014. 1. 17( 금 ) 라 . 제출방법 : 학과 /전공별로 취합하여 공문으로 제출 마 . 제출처 : 교무처(학적팀) * 제 2008-3회 학사연구심의위원회에서 신청기간이 경과 후 추가로 재 학년한연장 신청을 접수하지 않기로 결정되었음을 알려드립니다. graduate students (including integrated MS-PhD)whose academic program time limit ends as of Feb. 28, 2014 may apply for an extension subject to approval by the Academic Affairs and Research Review Committee. Instructions are provided below. = Details = A. Applicability: Those who are eligible to apply for extension of the academic program time limit among the graduate students (including integrated MS-PhD) whose academic program time limit ends as of Feb. 28 (excluding students expecting graduation in Feb. 2014) * The list of eligible students will not be delivered separately. B. Required Document : Application Form for Extension of Academic Program Time Limit C. Deadline: Friday, January 17, 2014 D. How to Submit : Please submit list of students by department (division) E. Submit to the Office of Academic Affairs (Academic Registrar's Team) * Applications for extension of the prescribed time limit will not be accepted after the deadline as decided in the 3rd Academic Affairs and Research Review Committee 2008. Please ensure that students adhere to the above deadline. Attachment : Application Form for Extension of Academic Period (Korean/English). End
